author: Robi Polikar and L. Upda and S. S. Upda and Vasant Honavar
title: Learn++: an incremental learning algorithm for supervised neural networks
venue: IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics, Part C, 31

An MLP with 50 hidden layer nodes and a 100 times smaller error goal of 0.001 was able to match (and slightly exceed) Learn++ performance, by classifying 95% of the TEST dataset. B.
